originalText.text: At our first meeting to discuss the restoration of my landscape oil painting, signed by the artist, Olga inspired confidence with her knowledge and careful consideration of what was needed to bring it to its original warmth and brightness.  It was fun to explore potential improvements with her and to see her gentle touch and technique revealing complex brushstrokes and color that had been obscured by years in storage.  Her documentation and photos of steps along the way were clear and thorough, and the final results were thrilling.  My painting was transformed by her care and skill and I delight in it every day.

text.text: At our first meeting to discuss the restoration of my landscape oil painting, signed by the artist, Olga inspired confidence with her knowledge and careful consideration of what was needed to bring it to its original warmth and brightness.  It was fun to explore potential improvements with her and to see her gentle touch and technique revealing complex brushstrokes and color that had been obscured by years in storage.  Her documentation and photos of steps along the way were clear and thorough, and the final results were thrilling.  My painting was transformed by her care and skill and I delight in it every day.

originalText.text: Olga did exceptional work in restoring an early 20th-century oil painting that was in extremely fragile condition. The canvas had become warped and slacked; the tacking edges were torn and the stretcher keys had become structurally weak. There were several tears in the canvas and layers of dirt and grime covering painting. Olga was able to transfer the painting to a new stretcher and then clean and re-touch the canvas. The painting now looks like new and hangs proudly in our living room. Olga was also a pleasure to work with throughout the process and I will certainly use her again for future art restoration projects.

text.text: Olga did exceptional work in restoring an early 20th-century oil painting that was in extremely fragile condition. originalText.text: I sent photos of a painting that had been damaged by poor treatment and age to several people for appraisals of restoration work. Olga was the most specific in discussing the problems and possibilities and cost up-front. So I contracted with her to do the work. She researched the artist and figured out what was needed and how to best restore the artwork.  I'm delighted with the results, as she was able to bring out the original beauty of the  painting far more than I thought was possible. She went far and beyond, even suggesting how to frame it for maximal effect. Definitely would use her again.

originalText.text: Olga taught me to "see," and to love, my collection of 19th c. paintings by my ancestor even more than I already did! She's terrific: enthusiastic, knowledgeable, helpful, reliable, all the good traits of an experienced professional.

originalText.text: Olga did a wonderful job restoring a painting for a friend a while back. I was amazed how much better it looked. I plan to bring a treasured family painting to her that needs a lot of work. If anyone can being it back to life, I’m confident she can.
